text: A man gave a petition to Superintendent of Police A. Saravanan here on Monday, seeking probe into the mysterious death of his three-year-old granddaughter. Rathinasamy of Vellamalaipatti in Athoor block said that her granddaughter Deborah was found missing on February 3. A complaint was lodged with the Sempatti police immediately but no action was taken to trace the girl. Three days later, the child was found dead in a farm well under mysterious circumstances. Though the Sempatti police registered a case, they did not initiate any action even after one month, Mr. Rathinasamy said.
title: Man seeks probe into mystery death
